name: AFK Warriors
description:
Features of the game:


-AFK system.
Your heroes will fight automatically even when you are offline, so you can easily get a lot of equipment and experience!


-Legendary squad, more than 130 hero cards.
Choose suitable heroes from different factions to your squad and equip them with powerful gear!

-Varied gameplay

AFK - mode, battle mode, adventure missions, collecting hero cards, mazes, towers, arenas, factions and all this in AFK Warriors!

-Lots of strategies to choose from

Match hero strengths, skills, equipment, faction bonuses to surpass your opponents and become the greatest!


Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/afkwarriorseng/
Please let us know when you have any questions: https://infiplay.com/support
Privacy policy: https://infiplay.com/page/privacy
